page.title: 06A day in my life
page.content: I am nine years old and I live in Coventry. A typical school day for me would be to get up at 6.45. I have breakfast of Kelloggs Corn Flakes, toast and a cup of tea. Next I get ready for school. I walk to school with my mum, my brother Nathaniel and two sisters Bethan & Erin. School starts at 8.55. I spend the morning doing number & English. We have school dinner at 12.OO & then spend an hour in the playground. I play 'Headers' & volleyball with my friend Dean. During the afternoon we do Art or Topic & go home at 3.35. After school I help my mum and sometime watch television. We have tea at 6.OO. Next I get ready for bed. I go to bed at 7.OO & read until 7.3O & then I go to sleep.
